Package org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BicycleListener
    Update the viewer when the bicycle or rider changes
    ComponentOwner
    Interface for component change notification.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseComponent
    BaseComponent class is basic building block for all the parts of a Bicycle.
    Bicycle
    Bicycle component - contains and manages all the sub components for a bicycle.
    BicycleChangeEvent
    Bicycle Change Event - fired when a Bicycle is changed
    ComponentChangeEvent
    Component Change Event - fired when an attribute inside the component changes.
    Cranks
    Cranks component of the Bicycle.
    FrameSet
    The frame component of the bicycle.
    HandleBar
    This class is a controller class for the distinct types of handlebars.
    HandleBarAero
    This is the aero handlebar sub-handlebar.
    HandleBarDrop
    Drop handlebar handlebar sub-component.
    HandleBarRiser
    The rise bar handlebar sub-component.
    HandleBarStraight
    Straight handlebar handlebar sub-component.
    Pedals
    The pedals component of the bicycle.
    Rider
    Rider contains all the geometry for a Bicycle specific rider.
    RiderMeasurements
    Class for Rider size - this is class for UI interaction that shares it's values with all the rider objects in The Bicycle collection (one rider per bicycle) of a project.
    RiderPose
    The rider pose controls the posture of the stick figure on the bicycle.
    Saddle
    The saddle component of the bicycle.
    SeatPost
    The seat post component of the bicycle.
    Stem
    The stem component of a bicycle.
    Wheel
    The Wheel component of the bicycle.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BicycleDisplay
    Enumerator for Bicycle display state.
    BicycleEventType
    Enumerator for event type in bicycle events.
    BicycleLayout
    This is for controlling the display layout of the bicycles.
    HandleBarPosition
    This defines four values for querying the hand position from a handlebar.
    HandleBarType
    Enumerator for the different handlebar types.
    SaddlePosition
    Enum for the saddle position of the rider.
